App.home.header.title: The all in one digital solution for small hotels
App.home.header.description: It's the modern way to manage your small hotel: Sync reservations cross-platform, build a world class website and boost revenue.
App.home.body.title1: A technology investment that pays off
App.home.body.description1: Be a leader in your field and start digitalising your business today
App.home.body.description2: We give you a world-class online presence, boost direct bookings and free up more time for the things you love
App.home.body.description3: Traditional PMSes were designed to simply to manage bookings. Visitor was purpose-built to give you a world-class digital experience. Our platform helps hotel owners drive more revenue, eliminate repetitive tasks and free up more time.
App.home.body.metric2.title: 10h
App.home.body.metric2.description: free up to 10 hours per week
App.home.body.metric3.title: 3x
App.home.body.metric3.description: customers are 3 times more likely to leave a review
App.home.body.metric4.description: average increase in revenue for our customers
App.home.body.howItWorks.list.1: with top travel booking websites such as booking or airbnb
App.home.body.howItWorks.list.2: your revenue by driving more direct bookings
App.home.body.howItWorks.list.3: from your customers by showcasing a professional digital look
App.home.footer.title: What's next?
App.home.footer.description: You’re here for answers. We’re here to help. Dig into our product section or request a demo for free, without any obligation.
App.login.title: Visitor - Login
App.home.body.gameChanger.title: How Visitor changes the game
App.product.header.features.title: The digital solution your small hotel needs
App.product.header.features.description: Mobile-first. Easy to use. Amazing user experience. We automate your operational tasks so you can focus on the things you love.
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.title: Hotel management system
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.featur: One place to keep an eye on everything. You can move reservations around, close rooms and create new reservations.
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.yourVo: The only white-label hotel management system out there which allows you to maintain the relationship with your customers. It's your name, your logo and your message. Everything is customizable!
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.automa: Automatically update your room availability across your website and connected booking channels. Double bookings are a thing of the past!
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.guestM: Keep guests engaged from the moment they book with you and beyond. Easily send special offers or discounts to former guests.
App.product.directBookingTechnology.desc: Take commission-free bookings straight from your existing website and Facebook page by integrating Visitor's booking engine.
App.product.directBookingTechnology.dire: Use our proven direct booking technology to boost your direct bookings by up to 36%.
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.facebo: Turn your Facebook page into a money-making machine by connecting your Book now button to the booking engine.
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.specia: Easily showcase special offers, vouchers or discounts on your booking engine website.
App.product.hotelManagementSystem.google: Connect to Google and expand your visibility on metasearch. Guests will find you on Google and then be sent back to your website to book.
App.company.header.title: We're building for the digital era
App.company.header.description: Our next-generation hotel management platform powers great digital experiences
App.company.header.customers.title: 300 paying customers and counting
App.company.problemStart.title: We started with a problem
App.company.problemStart.description: Legacy PMS couldn't keep up with the demand for an amazing digital experience
App.company.problemStart.forHumansByHuma: Our founders saw that existing PMS systems couldn’t easily adapt to the growing demand for an great digital experience. So, they built software to solve this.
App.company.problemStart.betterDigitalEx: A better way to deliver digital experiences
We’re leading the next-generation approach to hotel management — beyond a normal PMS and channel manager — to a modern, all in one digital platform your hotel needs.
App.company.values.title: It’s not just what we do, it’s how we do it
App.company.values.description: These values guide us and keep us grounded
App.company.values.beHumble.title: Be humble
App.company.values.beHumble.description: We are not centered on ourselves, but focus on the needs and contributions of others around us.
App.company.values.workBackwards.title: Start with the customer and work backwards
App.company.values.workBackwards.descrip: The first question we ask is "What customer need does this solve?" We treat each customer with empathy.
App.company.values.growthMindset.title: Embody a growth mindset
App.company.values.growthMindset.descrip: We believe in our collective potential to develop and evolve through dedication and continuous learning.
App.company.values.striveTogether.title: Strive together
App.company.values.striveTogether.descri: Creating anything of significance without collaboration is challenging, so we work hard together to make an impact.
App.company.footer.title: Want to know more?
App.company.footer.subtitle: Talk to a friendly expert at Visitor to learn more about our product and company.
